questions.question: Graphology analyzes the grammar, spelling, and sentence structure of written material.
A calligrapher creates artistic forms out of alphabetical symbols.
Tight slacks are best worn by those of callipygian anatomy.
Cacographic writing is easy to read.
Gerontology aims to help old people live more comfortably.
Senile people are old but still vigorous and mentally alert.
In a society dedicated to the worship of youth, senescence is not an attractive prospect.
